name: BarcodeCaptureDict
summary: Simple object passed to capture to capture a Barcode.

properties.name: acceptedFormats
properties.summary: An optional array of int constants detailing which barcode formats are accepted. Defaults to all formats. Check out the "Barcode Format Constants" section below to see the available int constants.

properties.name: allowedEANExtensions
properties.summary: An optional int[] that specifies allowed extension lengths for EAN or UPC barcodes. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

properties.name: allowedLengths
properties.summary: An optional int[] that specifies allowed lengths of encoded data -- reject anything else. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

properties.name: animate
properties.summary: Indicates if the device should animate between the current activity and the camera activity when the current activity is in a different orientation than the camera. Default is true.

properties.name: assumeCode39CheckDigit
properties.summary:
An optional boolean which if true, will assume Code 39 codes employ a check digit. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

Please note that this hint only applies to FORMAT_CODE_39 format barcodes.

properties.name: assumeGS1
properties.summary:
An optional boolean to assume the barcode is being processed as a GS1 barcode, and modify behavior as needed. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

Please note that this hint only applies to FORMAT_CODE_128 format barcodes.

properties.name: characterSet
properties.summary: An optional string that specifies what character encoding to use when decoding, where applicable https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

properties.name: frameHeight
properties.summary: Height of the rectangle that is shown in the scanner

properties.name: frameWidth
properties.summary: Width of the rectangle that is shown in the scanner

properties.name: keepOpen
properties.summary: Whether or not to keep the barcode scanner open after a barcode is recognized. Defaults to false. When set to true, "success" will fire once every time a barcode is recognized, up to two times per second. As such, it can fire multiple times for a single barcode!

properties.name: overlay
properties.summary: The view to lay on top of the camera activity.

properties.name: preventRotation
properties.summary: Prevent the scanner from auto-rotating when the device is rotated. Default: true

properties.name: pureBarcode
properties.summary: An optional boolean to assume the image is a pure monochrome image of a barcode. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

properties.name: returnCodabarStartEnd
properties.summary:
An optional boolean which if true, will return the start and end digits in a Codabar barcode instead of stripping them. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/

Please note that this hint only applies to FORMAT_CODABAR format barcodes.

properties.name: showCancel
properties.summary: Whether or not to include the default cancel button. Defaults to true.

properties.name: showRectangle
properties.summary: Whether or not to include the default rectangle around the scanning area. Defaults to true.

properties.name: tryHarder
properties.summary: An optional boolean to spend more time to try to find a barcode; optimize for accuracy, not speed. https://zxing.github.io/zxing/apidocs/
